title: Why DOTA SUCCEED AND LOL FAILED
body:
DOTA:introduce only 2 new balanced fun champs
LOL:lots of unbalanced garbage,flashy skills that just 1 shot everything 

DOTA:rebalance items,moved some to npc drops(farm jungle for nice items at 10% chance)
LOL:broken split push item,nerfs support items,buff items that did not need a buff 

DOTA:map rebalance and minimal edits on paths and jungle camps
LOL:breaks jungle,map with dragons,etc

at this point LOL is just a meme,and its kinda sad to see the game at this state
for now i ll just play DOTA,rather to endure drunk  ruskis and non english speaker muslim in EU  than overall LOL garbage

edit:lets not forget the new RIOT mini client that causes fps loss and lag spikes cause its a mini chrome runing in the background
